thread.title: Store celebrates 10,000th shoplifter with parade, champagne
thread.title_full: Store celebrates 10,000th shoplifter with parade, champagne | Business News | Business and Finance News | | The Advertiser

author: JOHNNY OLEKSINSKI
title: Store celebrates 10,000th shoplifter with parade, champagne
text:
OH, EUROPE. First Eurovision, now this?
A video posted last week from the Netherlands depicting a store’s alleged 10,000th shoplifter being caught has racked up over 300,000 views. What punishment — fine, arrest, public berating — does the thief get?
Champagne all around!
The blurry-faced criminal stands for a moment, frozen, as the store’s employees, like characters out of Borat, shower her with party hats, cake and enthusiasm to boot.
Then ... she bolts.
What a shame. The robber came to the store looking to pocket some free stuff, and the moment it arrives, she runs.
As the saying goes, the grass is always greener ...
SHOPLIFTER GETS PARADE
This article originally appeared on New York Post .
 Shoplifter cops bizarre punishment
